name: Dying Oceans
description:
This is a game about ocean pullution where you play as a fish trying to survive the plastic and humans. Use the mouse or touch to move the fish around. You must dodge plastic in the ocean, escape fishermen, and find food to survive.

This game was made to educate people about what humans did to the ocean.

By 2050 there will be more plastic than fish in the ocean! We can change that!

#playing4theplanet
